content:
I was unable to get the pytester to work for ps1 and manually tested cases in Python Tutor - everything worked so I submitted that. During my checkoff today, I found out that my counter variable for the bisection search should have been "steps" instead of "counter". My code still works, I just did not have the correct variable.

What can be done to address this for my pset 1 grade?

Also, when will I receive a score? I currently do not see anything on my 6.100L website.
subject: Steps variable in ps1c
